# Car Rental App - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a React Native Web Car Rental application built with Expo.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo (Web support)
- React Navigation for routing
- React Context API for state management
- Modern UI with custom styling

## Features
- User authentication (login/register)
- Role-based access (Owner, Renter, Admin)
- Owner dashboard to manage vehicles for rent
- Renter dashboard to browse and filter available vehicles
- Price filtering and vehicle search

## Project Structure
- `/src/screens` - All app screens
- `/src/components` - Reusable components
- `/src/context` - Authentication context
- `/src/navigation` - Navigation configuration
- `/src/data` - Mock data for vehicles

## Running the Project
```bash
npm install
npx expo start --web
```

## Development Notes
- The app uses mock data for demonstration
- Authentication is simulated (no backend required)
- All styling uses React Native StyleSheet
